description: Base device identity and context metadata UDT. Provides ISA-95 location context (Area, Unit), ISA-5.1 tag identification, and a link to the SM Profile definition. Used as a nested UDT instance inside all instrument and equipment profiles.
applicableTo: All equipment types requiring standard identification and context metadata

attributes.name: ShortName
attributes.description: Human-readable equipment name used in UNS topic path (e.g., Harvest Valve)

attributes.name: ProfileDefinition
attributes.description: URL to the SM Profile definition that this instance conforms to

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Free-text description of the equipment instance
